name: S.A.N.T.A.
description:
Description

Deliver food as Santa on your bike during summer in your swim trunks in this crazy fast, rhythm-based, arcady, crazy mix of a game!

KluJam #8

This game was made for the Klagenfurt Game Jam #8 (KluJam #8) with the theme "Unusual Combination" and was created from scratch within 48 hours.

Diversifiers
  • It speaks! - Give your game a voice
  • Different every time - Procedurally generation is used in the game
How to Play
  • Deliver as many food boxes as possible!
  • Press A and D to the beat to accelerate
  • Use your mouse to steer
  • Hold the left mouse button to aim and release it to shoot
  • Delivering food boxes to houses without an order gives no points!
Team
  • Sebastian Uitz (https://www.firetotemgames.com/) - Project Lead, Game Design, Programming
  • Michael Steinkellner (https://www.merlinnsound.com/) - Music and Sound Effects
  • Manuel Santner (https://polylabs.org/)- 3D Assets
  • Alessandro Chiovoloni (https://www.kauaikayote.com/) - 2D Assets

Thanks to Lena Steinkellner for the game idea. 
Thanks to Thomas and Guido for the crazy brainstorming session that led to the creation of this game.
